title: Return envelope, ballot envelope; instructions
context: ยง15-6 Return envelope, ballot envelope; instructions. The clerk shall provide the absentee voter with the ballots, ballot envelopes, and a return envelope that shall contain a statement to be subscribed to by the voter that affirms the fact that the voter is the person voting and that the voter&rsquo;s employer or agent of the employer, agent of the voter&rsquo;s labor union, or any candidate listed on the ballot did not assist the voter, as described in section 11-139, along with the instruction that the voter&rsquo;s ballot will be valid only if the affirmation statement is signed, materials summarizing the provisions in sections 19-3, 19-3.5, 19-4, and 19-6, and any other information prescribed by the rules promulgated by the chief election officer.
